item.title: Named Parameters in Dart, Swift and Python
item.description: In software development we optimize for readability since code is read more than its written. Named parameters are one way to improve code readability. Lets say we have a function that calculates the distance between two points. I takes two point Point class instances representing the start and end positions. When calling the functions, using positional arguments its not very clear what is being referred to. In Python: In Dart:
